string-array.name: cards_selection
string-array.item: We were into _B_ before it was cool.
The Colonel’s secret spice contain _B_.
I love the smell of _B_ in the morning.
_B_ was so good even Grumpy Cat smiled.
_B_ is my chosen weapon for the apocalypse.
The secret weapon in the war against bad sprints is _B_.
_B_ was all the things, to all the people.
The secret to a good sprint they don’t want you to know about is _B_ .
More beautiful than a double rainbow; when _B_ just works.
I’ll tell you what I want, what I really really want: _B_.
I want to shout it from the rooftops. I love: _B_.
_B_ is the modern-day Betamax.
The tenth circle of hell is made up of _B_ .
_B_ keeps me up at night.
Ain’t nobody got time for _B_ .
_B_ is more offensive than the teeth of a Jeremy Kyle guest.
I wouldn\'t wish _B_ to my worst enemy.
Don’t feed gizmo after midnight or you may end up with _B_.
Drawing a perfect circle on an etch a sketch is easier than _B_.
The only thing I regret is _B_.
_B_ should be sent to bed without supper.
If only we’d known about _B_ sooner.
_B_ : what\'s the worst that could happen?
I\'m 100% sure, except maybe _B_ .
_B_ could save the world. Or it could kill us all.
I like to try new things, but is _B_ really the answer?
_B_ didn’t go exactly how I’d have liked. But it worked.
_B_ surprised me more than Chris Evans leaving Top Gear.
I figured it all out, but _B_ still baffles me.
_B_ confused us more than Opal Fruits changing to Starburst.
why didn\'t we think of _B_ sooner?
Who could have guessed that _B_ would be a thing this sprint?
No one puts _B_ in the corner.
_B_ is a one man/woman army.
The name’s Bond. _B_ Bond.
Who you gonna call? _B_!
Even Chuck Norris bows down to _B_.
I’d take _B_ home to meet the parents.
Nothing compares to _B_.
Always be yourself, unless you can be _B_.
_B_: not the hero we want, but the hero we definitely need.
I’d recommend _B_ to a friend.
_B_ is an unstoppable sprint beast.
But before I kill you, Mr Bond, I must show you _B_ !
I drink to forget _B_ .
if _B_ did not exist we would have to invent them.
Egypt has pyramids; we have _B_ .
